{{ university.instituteCode}} {{university.universityName }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Route, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { DegreeType } from 'src/app/Course'; import { StudentserviceService } from 'src/app/service/studentservice.service'; import { University } from 'src/app/University'; @Component({ selector: 'app-degreetype', templateUrl: './degreetype.component.html', styleUrls: ['./degreetype.component.css'] }) export class DegreetypeComponent { universities! :University[]; constructor(private studentservice:StudentserviceService,private router: Router){} private filterByDegreeType(degreeType:DegreeType){ this.studentservice.filterByDegreeType(degreeType).subscribe(data => {this.universities = data;}) } }
